title: Client Troubles Please Help...
body:
So I decided to install league onto my laptop (I am assuming that you can download the client onto two separate computers and still have it run as long as you login; correct me if I am wrong), anyways I am running into quite a problem, for starters the client does download but gets to around 94% and then indicates an error has occured (very vague I know) and starts to re-download the client again from 33%,  so I figured if I let it download it will finish. But as the download approaches 94% it runs into another error and start to re-download again at 33% I have let it re-download about 5 times now and it still gets to 94% and restarts at 33%, so I tried to reinstalling the client from the installer and it still does the same thing..... Anyhelp would be appropriate. 
P.S. My laptop is brand new, league is the first game installed. So I don't think there is something wrong with the computer.

replies.body: Assuming you're specifically receiving the unspecified error, your network might be having trouble keeping a strong connection specifically to the game server and failing to download game files.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get your network tuned up and to wrap up the updates.  Let me know if you have any questions.
